description: Try a sweet twist on the famous baked feta pasta recipe with this divine dessert. Roasted strawberries with baked white chocolate will make your tastebuds sing.
keywords: Chocolate treats,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Video,Valentine's Day,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: Cheat's White Chocolate Crumble With Strawberries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Place chocolate in centre of tray. Scatter strawberries around edge of tray. Bake for 10 minutes or until chocolate is golden.
Remove tray from oven. Using a fork, break up chocolate. Serve strawberries sprinkled with chocolate.
